-e ---

ⲁ ⋍ 𐌳 da !

𒋫 ⲁ ⋍ 𐌳 dha ≠ pha α 𒁍

𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > ταῦρος => 𒋫 Taur vs Bauer 𒁍 púʳ par פר bull

α alpha al'Pha al𐌸a ALTA Ⲁ
conflict pa/da ⇨ resolution: a < but

不 but > ⲁⲧ avoid- ⲁⲧ- ANTI aint- not- ⲁⲧ- dont- ⲁⲑ dis¬ des¬
ⲁ- ⲁⲧ- ⲁⲑ- ⲉⲛⲉ- ⲟⲩ- !! un- not- ¬

devil sign :
ⲁ⋍𐌳 da! 𓄿 ⇔ 𓅂 𓂝 ⇔ 𓂞

𐌳Ⲁ daˡphaˡ devil व (old reading, just ᶠa in christian words)
no < ⲛ < ⲁⲛ < den 𓂜 dont ⇔ anti

ˢʸⁿkhai ⲉⲛⲭⲁⲓ = 𓐍𓏏𓏛 ⲁ⋍𐌳 da! ⲭⲁⲓ ⋍ 𓐍𓏏𓏛 ⋍ Güter!
አሐዱ ʾaħadu ⇔ ⲟⲩⲁ (1) erst
ⲥ ⲛⲁⲩ secondⲩ
ⲡⲁⲕⲉ ⲡ.dak דַּק daq ደቂቅ daqiq 1/dick
ϩⲁⲓ hai Hüter husband?
ⲙⲁⲁⲩ Mother!
ⲃⲣⲁ fruit 𓉐 𓂋 𓏏 𓍁 𓈓
ⲉⲓⲱⲧ Gevātta
ϩⲁⲗⲏⲧ GeTier… ϩⲁⲗ 𓅂 tyw طير ṭīr 🐦 tier 2. ⲁⲗⲏⲧ Flught opter ዖፍ ʿof
ⲟⲩⲧⲁϩ < frutta פְּרִי p'rī
ϣⲁⲁⲣ ša'ar š'dar ⲁⲣ der leder doubling
ⲁϥ ṭabhu (meat)
ⲕⲁⲥ עֶצֶם gutz(im) osteo 𒄈𒉻𒁺 eṣemtu (bone)
ⲥⲁⲧ Schwanz (zibbatu / cat-tail)
ⲱⲧ fat 𒉌𒄑
ⲉⲓⲁ sight : eye
ϣⲁ snout (nose) ⇔ ŧinzā
ⲗⲁⲥ las lišānu •latz
ⲣⲁⲧ foot (sic)
ⲣⲟ pû/rot (sic)
ⲙⲁϩⲧ maht,ⲙⲉϩⲧⲟ mehto አማዑት amāʿut Magen

ⲕⲁϩ kah kur earth ƙásáa < •kadah ⲕⲁϩ quarters

ⲁⲩⲱ đ with … corruption word!

Summary:
The old reading of Ⲁ was probably not 'a', but 'pha'
The ancient reading of Ⲁ was probably not 'pha', but 'tha'
